name: Party Crasher
description:
In Party crasher, you play as a party animal who is never invited to any parties, so they must find a way to sneak in. Enjoy party activities while avoiding the patrolling bouncers. Get drinks, go dance, look around the terrace and the vip area. Just remember to get out as fast as you can when the last call comes

This game was a small project we made for 2 months, so any possible feedback would be appreciated. Full version might be coming some day, but we don't have any plans currently.
